task_description: Redesign Notes Explorer page to Obsidian-style file explorer with compact header, collapsible tree navigation, and enhanced detail panel. Remove redundant People, Places, Tags views.

collapsible_tree.description: Sidebar explorer uses sbSection, sbSectionHead, sbSectionToggle for collapsible tree structure with chevron icons

compact_list.description: Single-line selectable items with active state styling

split_panel.description: Two-panel layout with list on left and detail/inspector on right

icon_usage.description: Available icons: chevronDown, chevronRight, folder, file, search, plus

current_structure.header: Multi-row (title, search, sort, filter tabs, filter chips) - needs consolidation
current_structure.main_content: Masonry card grid - to be replaced with tree navigation
current_structure.inspector: Right panel with property sections - to be preserved/enhanced

notes_explorer.filter_functionality: Already has filterType: all/category/tag/person/place with selectedFilters array
notes_explorer.note: Core filtering logic should be preserved, only UI restructure needed

sidebar_buttons.description: Three railBtn blocks for people, places, tags to be removed

workspace_view_type.description: WorkspaceViewKey union type includes 'people' | 'places' | 'tags' to be removed

css_patterns.sidebar_classes: sb* classes for sidebar explorer tree structure
